Posts.Content: CHWES wrote: My mum will be starting chemotherapy for her breast cancer next week. I was wondering if anybody could give me any advice on how to care for her after the chemotherapy?  Is there anything I can do that will make her feel more comfortable? I assume each case is different, but any advice would be much appreciated!  Thanks.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Caring for a chemo patient CHWES CV9

Posts.Content: Nov 26, 2010 03:39PM CHWES wrote: Thank you so much for your useful tips and kind words. Cooking and shopping I can definitely do!  It's nice to hear other people's success stories. I admire your confidence and determination, especially for carry on working through chemo!  Thanks again for your reply, it means a lot to me.
